mapper.select: SELECT B.BOOKMARK_ID , B.GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL , B.BOARD_ID , B.POST_ID , B.BOOKMARK_YN , M.EMAIL , M.NICKNAME , M.INFO_AGREEMENT_YN , M.PROFILE_PIC , M.REGIST_DATE , GP.GENERAL_POST_ID , GP.POST_WRITER , GP.BOARD_ID , GP.POST_TITLE , GP.POST_CONTENT , GP.POST_DATE , GP.LIKE_CNT , GP.VIEW_CNT , CC.CODE_ID , CC.CODE_TYPE , CC.CODE_CONTENT FROM BOOKMARK B INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.EMAIL = B.GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL INNER JOIN GENERAL_POST GP ON GP.GENERAL_POST_ID = B.POST_ID INNER JOIN GENERAL_POST_HASHTAG GPH ON GP.GENERAL_POST_ID = GPH.GENERAL_POST_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.CODE_ID = GPH.HASHTAG_ID WHERE BOOKMARK_YN = 'Y' AND M.EMAIL = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARK ( BOOKMARK_ID , GENERAL_MEMBER_EMAIL , BOARD_ID , POST_ID , BOOKMARK_YN) VALUES ( 'BM-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_BOOKMARK_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) , #{generalMemberEmail} , #{boardId} , #{postId} , 'Y')
